modName: Dark Brotherhood HD Armor Retexture Real Crimson
summary: Retexture of the Dark Brotherhood Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This is a high resolution retexture of the vanilla Dark Brotherhood Armor. Just extract the data folder to your skyrim directory.

I made this texture replacer because the vanilla Dark Brotherhood armor seemed very dull to me and I had to fix it. Now your character will be feared by all of Skyrim as you wear the true colors of the Dark Brotherhood! 

The texture replacer works with most armor mesh replacers.
author: Zeelie
